See 'Serotonin syndrome' and 'Monoamine-oxidase inhibitor' under Antidepressant drugs for more information and for specific advice on avoiding monoamine-oxidase inhibitors during and after administration of other serotonergic drugs.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  safinamide  and  tramadol  can increase the risk of serotonin syndrome. hasDitaContent.@value: Safinamide is predicted to increase the risk of side-effects when given with tranylcypromine. Manufacturer advises avoid and for 1 week after stopping safinamide.
